author: dkhaywood
msg: Minor tidying up of facets (mostly just reorg imports) - no functional changes.  For NakedObjectPersistor, reordered the methods into functional groups.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Minor tidying up of facets (mostly just reorg imports) - no functional changes.  For NakedObjectPersistor, reordered the methods into functional groups.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Moved valueSpec() up from TypeOfFacetAbstract into SingleClassValueFacetAbstract.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added SingleClassValueFacet#valueSpec to return the NakedObjectSpecification rather than just the underlying Class.  Impacts the FacetFactory's since they now need to pass in the reflector (rather than relying on singleton static access, for testability).
